website_summaries.verdict: Bring back the memories of an old fashion candy shop with this unique gumball machine. A 1920s replica, this gumball machine is perfect for any room in the home.
pros: Cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism
Dispenses gumballs, peanuts, jelly beans, and more
Comes with a stand for the complete vintage look

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality for a kid's gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice Quality for a kid's gumball machine. Easy to assemble...My 10 year old and his 2 friends put the entire thing together quickly and without a hitch. Got this for son's 10th birthday gift. He wears braces so I got peanut m&ms and skittles instead of gumballs to fill the canister. The canister is glass and holds a large amount of gumballs/candy. We filled it with a giant party bag of m&m's and a giant bag of skittles. It takes any coin denomination and gives anywhere from 1 - 3 candies. My son just loves this nice gumball machine and so do his friends! I would definitely recommend this machine over a cheaper model. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: While adorable, the machines inner gears are made of cheap.plastic. the coin mechanism didn't even function properly out of the box. The globe itself is big and looks beautiful. Sadly mine came with hairline fractures right at the neck of the globe. I didn't trust it one bit. But it didn't matter, the coin mechanism jammed up every 3 or 4 turns. So dissapointed because I was using it for a potty training reward system. Don't waste your money. It looks nice ,but will not function for long at all. I'm currently shopping for a new machine all together. Amazon was quick with refunding me. But it makes me sad that the entire thing is just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: GemmaStone

customer_reviews.title: Dispensing mechanism cheap, and doesnt work with regular sized gumballs
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes after the reviews, however this machine has major issues dispensing larger gumballs. The glass to the gumballs broke on day 2 after apparently tightening the screw. The stand is great, the mechanism is china bad. Very disappointed. The directions on how to change the settings are not even accurate for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B

customer_reviews.title: Takes any size coin
customer_reviews.text: As an engineering professor with a constant stream of needy academic visitors, I bought this so students would have something to chew on while they wait in line outside my office. It was easy to assemble even without the instructions (note: they are at the very bottom of the bag with the main machine body, you have to take everything out and then you will see them). What I didn't realize is that it takes any size coin, so put a 25 cents sticker or something or you'll end up losing money on the gumballs.
customer_reviews.author: EDL

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with this one but grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected. Coin slot keeps jamming so I have to constantly take apart. Not thrilled with this one but grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.author: Geter

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, not like the cast iron are
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP made..not like the older version. They were made of cast iron and didn't topple over. The glass top was also cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Okie gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, easy to assemble, and good price! I appreciate that the paint and materials used are non-toxic. I was able to easily clean the glass bowl prior to using. I find it pretty cool that the company who makes this product (Great Northern Popcorn) donates $10 to Austim Speaks, American Heart Association, or Susan G. Komen when buyers leave a review for the product. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This machine seriously could not be better. It arrived packaged VERY well. The globe part was already assembled; I just had to screw on the base and put on the legs. Easy as pie. Nice and heavy. It feels like it will be durable and hold up for years and years to come. It’s a perfect touch to my daughters’ candy themed room at my office.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: The glass globe broke within weeks.  Not sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My glass globe that hold gym balls broke within a few weeks. Huge bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Clg1011

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn't function well
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and is a good addition to my daughter's bedroom decor, but the function just isn't there. It constantly gets stuck and I have to disassemble it just to get a gumball out. If you want it just for your decor, go ahead and purchase. If you expect to consistently get gumballs out of it, look at a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to hold her peanut M&M's. The machine will dispense 4-5 M&M's at a time and you can set it to work with or without a coin.
customer_reviews.author: LSoule

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality! Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend! Real Glass, Real metal, Very Sturdy. Perfect for the whole family, especially little ones. Almost as tall as our 6 year old. We havent messed with the coin slot, and as it is - it will take any coin. Which we don't mind, as all the kids love to administer a coin, and turn knob for a gumball! We will have this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoyed it while it lasted it is glass bowl my husband ended up dropping it and breaking it accidentally. It was impressive it didn’t shatter it just punched a chunk solid we were able to put tape over it and still use it but I ended up giving it away to goodwill just cause superstitious about broken glass
customer_reviews.author: mouammar harb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, the quality surpassed my expectations and the overall design is great, I filled mine with runts and love it I will be ordering a second one
customer_reviews.author: Amaz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Well, this thing lived up to what we were looking for. It's pretty easy to put together, although you do need maybe a thin pliers and a screw driver! Overall seemed pretty sturdy, but the metal feet don't have the same weight that the base and pole have. I don't see us having any issues with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Mucci

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured. Fun to have!
customer_reviews.text: Store quality. Solid craftsmanship. My daughter loves it. Can disable feature that requires you to pay for gumball.
customer_reviews.author: Lblan

customer_reviews.title: Faulty coin mechanism!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift to my granddaughters. It has never worked completely. Coins get stuck and my daughter has tried to fix it a couple of times just to have the mechanisms to work. It now just sits in the closet. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Laura F.

customer_reviews.title: she loved it. very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my granddaughter. she loved it. very easy to put together. I like that you can control if it takes money or free range.
customer_reviews.author: KIM PRSLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to game room!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous addition to our game room! Such a great size! Looks like such an expensive piece! Works well for getting gum balls! Kids visiting always love getting gum!
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Well made!! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This gum ball machine is 100 times better that what I’d anticipated. Though I was purchasing a cheap little gum ball toy kind of thing for my nieces but was surprised when I saw how well and sturdy it was.
customer_reviews.author: Sthao

customer_reviews.title: The gumball machine has a great glossy finish
customer_reviews.text: The gumball machine has a great glossy finish. The assembly took less than 5 minutes and came with clear and simple instructions. The base is very sturdy and works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Very good material. Glass bowl made it have so much more life. Gave this for a Christmas gift and to also add to our movie room. The only thing that I would recommend is a better lock on top so the kids can’t unscrew it to get bubble gum out. “ yes my kids did it” :) other than that a real vintage bubble gum machine for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: sarah viljevac

customer_reviews.title: A magnificent machine
customer_reviews.text: Our kids and our adult friends all love it. Sturdy and well made. We’ve had ours since 2016 and it’s still making everyone smile. Will dispense any small candy, M&Ms, skittles, and of course 1/2 gumballs. A great novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: I love, love love this retro looking gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: I love, love love this retro looking gumball machine! Our decor has a bit of real retro and retro reproductions stuff like this item. This is nice looking, well made and soooooooooooo fun. Very easy to put together and fill with gumballs. Highly recommend for all ages. Nifty
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: We have adjusted this to take normal gumballs. But the gumballs don't drop into the slot when we fill it up thus it doesnt work. One by one if you place them into the slots they fit great with added room. We loved the idea of having this around my parents house as a way to engage the grandchildren in coin machines like what we grew up on, however we are not happy with the hassles to make it work. The globe also came with a small bubble. Otherwise, the stand and mechinisms are sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to spoil the grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in anticipation of a visit from our twin 5-year-old granddaughters. They will go nuts when they see this and start to feed it coins to get M&Ms. Of course, we'll supply the coins also. Very nicely made. The included instructions could be a little better about showing how to reassemble. Illustration is pretty small. But I found a better diagram online.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very nostalgic & beautifully detailed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these machines; one for our home and one for our grandson's 6th birthday coming up in July. The machine is beautifully detailed. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. We also ordered the Dubble Bubble 1/2" Assorted gumballs 5lbs to fill the machines. One bag fills the jar a little over 3/4 full and the gum was very fresh. Each time you insert a penny, nickel, dime or quarter you will get two gumballs. I think we will enjoy these machines for many years.
customer_reviews.author: shopgal92019

customer_reviews.title: Nonstop gum
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really enjoying this birthday gift... Her and friends. Perfect size for the kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Valdez Horne

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. Its metal and sturdy and she loves it. I wish there was an easier way to get the coins out but since she doesn't need to do that any time soon it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Orbie bevil

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture but better
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture but better, i bought a second one for my brother. The glass bowl is thin so it might break easily( the moving lady accidentally broke mine) fortunately i found a replacement bowl on here for like $20 plus $10 shipping and handling, thats like half of what i paid for the machine itself, i kinda felt ripped off but i really like the gumball machine so a made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase price. The Amazon drivers are destroying everything I own
customer_reviews.text: I was elated to get this for my Grande for a birthday gift. I've had one since my son was six. All the kids and adults love it. I can wait to see her face.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted this since I was a small child! It was everything I hoped it would be! The only downside is that it’s kind short, I would’ve liked it to be a little taller and the gum balls that are suggested are not enough to fill the whole container AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: n.martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for the price. It's a gift for Christmas so not sure yet how it'll hold up but totally adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Keep it full of skittles, and love it! It is great quality, and I like they I can make my candy free, or lock it so that friends have to use a quarter to get anything out! ;-p
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Long

customer_reviews.title: The Gumball dispenser fits in our very colorful room just wonderfully, and we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We have a bedroom in our home we refer to as "our M&M room" where we display all different kinds of products. The Gumball dispenser fits in our very colorful room just wonderfully, and we are very pleased with it! The Gumball dispenser is very heavy duty and of excellent quality. We're very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hanneson

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the one that was in the service station I ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the one that was in the service station I worked at as a teen back in the early 60's. Great product, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rodder

customer_reviews.title: My son always wanted this!
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a gumball machine so I purchased this one for his loft bedroom. He absolutely loves it. It’s a really great quality stand. I have it set to accept any coins so his friends can buy gun.
customer_reviews.author: singhsongs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas present. Kids love getting gumballs out of it as rewards for homework and whatever they do to deserve a gumball. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix04

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but a little cranky
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable little gumball machine! However, he's got a tendency to jam, at least with the largest-size opening, if users aren't careful to turn the knob allllll the way when they put in their coin. I used with 1" plastic refillable balls. Smaller items might not pose a problem.
customer_reviews.author: The Chel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality, with real glass and metal frame. It makes a great gift and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Cornelio

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjustable, enjoying its treats while banking loose change
customer_reviews.text: Lovey item, not the heavy weighted original gum machines once known to Baby Boomers, but a lovely functional piece. Easily adjustable, enjoying its treats while banking loose change.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this gumball machine. Very stylish in my kitchen. Currently have m&ms in it and will do jelly beans next.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! Visitors all comment on how fun this is. The feet take some muscle to attach, but once together it is solid!!
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: So fun!! Bought this as a Christmas gift. We built it as part of a scavenger hunt to find all the pieces on Christmas Day. The quality is amazing. Love that you can set it for a quarter or free turn. Really cool looking!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Niece!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun gift to give. It's fun for everyone and has staying power. She set it up for free mode and is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of money ever
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money ever!!! I tried to adjust and fix but will only dispense one gumball before it clogs up again!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: tabbitha bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gumball machine! I was so impressed with the quality as soon as I opened the packaging. It is really well made and seems to be durable. I bought it for my 9-year-old as a birthday gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add to my gameroom/mancave. I'm very impressed. It's very well made. Sturdy metal, and the globe is made out of glass. Takes about five minutes to put together. I bought the 3.3lbs 1/2 dubble bubble gumball bag at Walmart for 7 bucks (lot cheaper than here). It fills the globe halfway. This gumball machine took me back in time to when I was a kid. Very cool. I think 50 bucks is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Made of hard metal and glass globe. Takes any coin. Perfect home gum machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Machines
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I've been searching for a good quality, large machine for years. All the antiques were decent, but hard to find parts for, and keep in good working order. This machine looks old, but is new - and the parts appear to be well made. I'm hoping these will last for years with regular use. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Love my gumball machines!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my gumball machines. They were easy to assemble and load.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper29

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well worth the money! Very well made. I don’t have one thing bad to say about this product. I have it setup in my office with a bowl of change for the kids. They absolutely love it and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo granddaughter picked this out because she is weird. But hey, it came as promised works great and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Fender

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Durable.......Beware though, I has to me bolted to floor.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back.....I just loved it.! Was going to keep at my house for when grand kids come over. Not something like the other grand parents have. I was disappointed that it was so top heavy, and would have to be bolted to the floor 🙁. I which there was a “work around” for that. I hated to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Candy lover
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine is just like the ones I used as a kid. Highly recommended. Works great with plain m&ms. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Pichette

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun item. Easy to put together. Vintage styling. Solid. Glad to have it. You should have one too!
customer_reviews.author: Texascook

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love putting coins in it! Easy to use. Smooth turn dial!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Messier

customer_reviews.title: High quality beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast shipping. Very easy to assemble to stand and product is very nice. Perfect size for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Stand is not threaded to screw together.
customer_reviews.text: I like the gumball machine part, but the stand is another story. We are supposed to screw the neck into the base for the stand and then attach the gumball machine to the neck. the neck is threaded, however, the base of the stand is not. There is no way to connect the neck to the base. So the stand is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cute gumball machine
customer_reviews.text: This gumball machine is cute, but I expected it to be taller. I'm 5'2 and it's just above my waist. It also uses coins to operate, whether it be pennies or quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap globe
customer_reviews.text: Globe broke. Cannot reach anyone for help. Now they Phone number says by email only. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Gum Machine is a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a White Elephant gift - because what else do you get people who need nothing...? It was great and highly sought after. Super easy to put together and well made. Ended up filling it with MnM's becasue I didn't order enough gumballs to fill it. I think I need another for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great present! Love the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter’s Christmas present. She absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Liv Tritapoe

customer_reviews.title: Very authentic, solidly made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids, they love getting quarters to put in this machine. I filled it with M&Ms and that works great. Very well made, solid, and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap & small machine. I was looking for something more sturdy and this was not it. It looks cheesy after you install it
customer_reviews.author: Rossa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gumball machine...
customer_reviews.text: Got this gumball machine for my 3 year old daughter for christmas and I know she is going to lose her mind when she sees it. Its well made and super easy to put together. Best thing of all is that you can actually put coins in it and turn, turn and turn (which she is obssesed with doing) and gumballs, m&m's etc. comes out. Super pleased with the purchase. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ALiSA

customer_reviews.title: great but
customer_reviews.text: really great product looks just like the picture after the quick building process!!!! only thing is the mechanism inside broke by bending inside while twisting after inserting the coin ,,, now its just sitting in the storage collecting dust .i honestly haven't had the time to buy the parts till today,,,, no bueno
customer_reviews.author: Luis Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gum Ball Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great quality gum ball machine. Works perfect. Buy it Now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A fun Candy machine
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and good quality. I have a jar of quarters and filled this machine with candy - it's a great incentive to reward my kids for doing good. They get a quarter for good deeds around the house...which allows them to buy some candy. They have fun being able to put the quarter in and get candy in return!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as my son's birthday gift. He likes it very much. Very easy to assemble and clean. Quality looks good too. Happy buy.
customer_reviews.author: Innis X

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Older Person!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific. Like everyone else says, it is a good value and a quality product. Purchased as a gift for my 94 year old Mother and filled it with chocolate covered almonds - she loved it! The first gift in 9 years that she didn't toss aside.
customer_reviews.author: JakeSpear Productions

customer_reviews.title: Great and just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect old fashioned candy machine. We have filled with gum balls, m&m’s, Mike & Ike’s, etc. I like that you can adjust how much comes out. Takes any coin. Stands about 4 feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: Shad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t work as should, when placing coin in, it doesn’t dispense out. Also the glass part broke when loading it with the gum balls... Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jams & don’t load gumballs
customer_reviews.text: This jams daily! I purchased the gum balls and machine at the same time. It is more of a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Tara G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the young at heart as well as an actual child.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazonian Stature

customer_reviews.title: Impressed :)
customer_reviews.text: My niece soooo happy i finally got her this machine. I couldnt be anymore happier. Im going to order another for my daughter :)
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!... but globe should be substantially stronger for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: So charming, and my 11yo daughter loved it! However, the globe is way to fragile for it’s purpose. It would definitely break easily, so probably not too safe for younger children.
customer_reviews.author: HappyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for a friend. Was perfect! Very sturdy and well made. A little shorter than I’d hoped but it worked well for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great gumball machine. The whole family loves it. No problem with the glass at all. And we took it apart and made it coin free without any problems! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: StacieL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: The coin mechanism is made of cheap plastic which will break easily, and you cannot get spare parts for it. Buy a real Carousel Gumball Machine which is made with all metal parts, and you can actually find spare parts online if they break.
customer_reviews.author: B. Harris

customer_reviews.title: So Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: My dad absolutely LOVED this gift for Christmas!! He uses peanut m&ms in it and says it works perfect. You can adjust the machine for more or less candy and also to use coins or not. He was thrilled. Wish I had a picture of it filled with the M&Ms
customer_reviews.author: Allison D.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite decoratives for the lowest price.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions needed, just read the emoji on the pieces. It’s the best price and size.
customer_reviews.author: john miller

customer_reviews.title: Family room presentable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so when my great grandkids come they can get a treat from it
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Sturdy! We used a 5lb bag of hard candy “Runts” typically 3-4 pieces of candy dispense. The 5lb bag filled the globe about 80% of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Swimmer for health & fun

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to raise some money to feed the animals!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine! Using it in a "petting zoo" to feed the animals a small portion of hay stretcher, grain, or treats.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great gumball machine!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. I put the item together which was nothing more than putting 4 screws in legs, screwing the two stand pieces together and then screwing the gumball machine to stand. I did not adjust the amount of candy dispensed yet but for quarter it spit out three gumballs. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sewnuts

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 6yo son. He loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6yo son. He loves it. It reminds me of walking out stores when I was young. Looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY BEAUTIFUL AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: Lights up the dining area. Kids look forward to getting their treats. Cute and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Janette G

customer_reviews.title: I still haven't got it going right yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it will work but the instructions need to be clearer on switching from coin operated to no coin operation. The rest of the assembly is common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Merle

customer_reviews.title: Works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: When you put the money in, it doesnt always work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: nickisa matthews

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they did before, but still worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was not as a heavy weight as the one I bought years ago. So that made it feel a little cheaper. Also cant change gumball sizes to match smaller gumballs without 2 or 3 coming out at once. But all and all it looks good and for the right size gum it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie I.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I think the top part is great. Works perfect. My issue the base is cheap feeling and not quite the cast iron look I thought it was.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Exceptional quality and style.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and so do all the nieces, nephews, and neighborhood kids.
customer_reviews.author: Earl B

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a top shelf/ quality gum ball machine. Kids were super excited when they came down and saw this x-mass morning. Easy to put together and adjust if needed. Can be used w/ or with out money. We're using money so it's extra cash for kids ;)
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the product, however dissappointed in the way in which it was delivered. It was suppose to be a gift for christmas for my husband, and it was delivered in the regular merchandise packaging, with only a shipping label on it. I would have preferred it in an unmarked box, or wrapped in brown paper to disguise the contents. My husband was home when it was delivered,... So, it spoiled the surprise. We are otherwise happy with the quality of the machine. The kids love it too. It was put together very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight for a gumball machine. This is not some kiddie plastic crappie. This is a quality glass globe and metal stand. So far the kids are enjoying it and it looks nice near my popcorn machine.
customer_reviews.author: momofmany

customer_reviews.title: Not what it is cracked up to be!
customer_reviews.text: Not what it is cracked up to be! The dispenser did not work properly and just could not get the gumball machine to function as Stated, will be returning as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper4life

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this gumball machine to put in the lobby of our office. We really like it. It's really cute and serves it's purpose. The only thing I wish I could change is that I wish it was a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass....please help needs to be replaced!
customer_reviews.text: I love the gumball machine but the glass bowl is broken. Im not sure who to call and how i can get anotherone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: Santa got this for my granddaughter and she just loves it
customer_reviews.author: Clesh

product_meta.title: 6260 Great Northern 15" Vintage Candy Gumball Machine & Bank with Stand - Everyone Loves Gumballs!
product_meta.description:
Style:Gumball Machine Bank with stand

If you are in the market for an antique style gumball machine, stop looking! The Great Northern Gumball Machine and Bank brings back memories of an old fashion candy shop with the penny gumball machine. This exquisite replica from the 1920s is constructed of premium quality components and is guaranteed authentic by Great Northern--Don't settle for cheap imitations! The Great Northern Gumball Machine will enhance any decor and is certain to be a conversation piece for years to come. It is perfect for businesses, dorm rooms, kid's rooms, and it completes your game room / home theater.

The base is constructed of a heavy-duty cast metal base and the globe is made of real glass--not cheap plastic. The heavy duty construction provides added stability and feel and prevents the machine from tipping over like some of the inferior units sold in the marketplace. Great Northern has incorporated an innovative dispensing mechanism which is fully adjustable so you can vary the amount of candy/gum that is dispensed when you turn the handle. In addition, there is a unique anti-spill cover which will keep your candy/gum in the tray and not on the floor. The machine also operates as a bank and has proven to be an effective tool for teaching kids how to save money.

Features / Specifications:

 * Real glass gumball machine globe - not cheap plastic
 * Premium Construction. Cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism
 * Accepts any coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies)
 * Includes instructions for "free spin" to work without coins
 * Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full
 * Anti-spill gumball dispenser with door cover
 * Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller), candy, or nuts
 * Gumball capacity: 5 lbs. of .62" gumballs
 * Dispenses Gumballs, Peanuts, Jellybeans & More
 * Choking Hazard - Not for children under 3 years
 * Color: Classic red finish
 * Weight: 10 lbs.
 * Machine Only Dimensions: 15"H x 8"W x 8"D
 * Machine on Stand Dimensions: 37"H x 18"W x 18"D
 * Full 1 Year Warranty!
feature_bullets: Real glass gumball machine globe - not cheap plastic
Premium construction. cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism
Accepts any coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies)
Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full
Machine on stand dimensions: 37-inch h by 8w
